plot: When Robin is mysteriously abducted, Batman's search leads him to Ra's Al Ghul, leader of the Society of Shadows.

Robin is missing, no one in Gotham has seen him as such or as Dick Grayson in a couple of days. A mysterious man called Ra's Al Ghul appears at the Batcave claiming to have a clue about his whereabouts; studying an image provided by the strange intruder, the first clue takes them to Calcuta in a search for both Robin and Al Ghul's daughter, that Al Ghul claims was abducted the same night that Batman's closest ally and friend.—David ----@DavidRealActor---
